message: A JavaScript library for globalization and localization. Formats and parses strings, dates and numbers in over 350 cultures. Enables complex culture-aware number and date parsing and formatting, including the raw culture information for hundreds of different languages and countries, as well as an extensible system for localization.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: globalize
caption: github.com
description: globalize - New age globalization and localization. Formats and parses strings, dates and numbers in over 350 cultures.
